overview: Hush features Jesse Jane and Shay Jordan, two of Digital Playground's hottest babes, alongside an amazingly gorgeous, all-star cast in well over 2 hours of hot erotic exploits. With a James Bond twist, the sweet flavor of sex and power, and lots of hushed play on silent movies, Jesse Jane is at her best in 5 decadent and explosive rendezvous. Adding fuel to the blazing fire, Shay Jordan ignites the screen in a passionate sequence with Scott Nails. Addison Rose, Dragon Lily, Charlie Laine and Daisy Marie lend their own beauty, hunger and sex appeal to the equation,
title: Hush
